actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to require that State social services plans comply with the Federal interagency day care requirements, subject to the existing penalties (termination of Federal payments or 3-percent reduction therein) in cases of noncompliance.

summary.text: Requires, under the Social Security Act, that State social services plans comply with the Federal interagency day care requirements, subject to the existing penalties (termination of Federal payments or 3-percent reduction therein) in cases of noncompliance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to require that State social services plans comply with the Federal interagency day care requirements, subject to the existing penalties (termination of Federal payments or 3-percent reduction therein) in cases of noncompliance.
